elements.text:
You are meeting with your boss. To make it on-time, you just walked up two flights of stairs quickly, and feel your heart beating very rapidly.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I'm worried that there's something really wrong with me.
I'm feeling excited now that my blood is pumping.
I'm worried that something's wrong with me, but I remind myself that it's normal to feel out of breath after walking up a bunch of stairs.
I'm happy I made the meeting on time.
I feel embarrassed about being out of breath, but I'm able to focus on what my boss has to say.
